As folks head to stores to buy up chocolate bunny rabbits for their children, I hope they will stop for a moment to consider that many of those companies use child slave labor to produce these products:
 
 http://acupofcoffee.wordpress.com/2007/03/26/slavery-and-your-easter-chocolate/
 
 http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/uk_news/6533405.stm
One of many, many reasons to only buy fairtrade chocolate.

One of many, many reasons to only buy fairtrade chocolate.

 
 Agreed. I also do not think schools, churches and businesses -- or the people employed or volunteering there -- should even be giving away chocolate to American or British children produced by African children who are slaves.
 
 IOW, I hope folks will think twice about what's being handed out at their local Easter egg hunts et al. Even if they didn't buy it directly themselves. What their children or grandchildren are consuming. What the Easter Bunny really put in their baskets.

Ummm...
 
 What if you support slavery?
 
 
 
 And this being the religion section of the forums, shouldn't you be commenting on the paganism endemic to Christianity or something and posting this political rant elsewhere?

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  The Real Easter Bunny
